column3:
A: {{c1::Did Sarah pass}} (Sarah / pass) her driving test?
B: No, she'll have to do it again.

A: {{c1::Did you go}} (you / go) out last night?
B: No, I stayed at home.

A: Where {{c1::did you get}} (you / get) that shirt?
B: It was a present.

A: {{c1::Did it rain}} (it / rain) yesterday?
B: No, the weather was good.

A: How much {{c1::did it cost}} (it / cost) to stay at the hotel?
B: A lot. It was very expensive.

A: What {{c1::did you do}} (you / do) last weekend?
B: I went to visit some friends of mine.
